name: browser-debugger-cli
description: DevTools telemetry in your terminal. For humans and agents. Direct WebSocket to Chrome's debugging port.

scripts.postbuild: node -e "require('fs').chmodSync('dist/index.js', 0o755)" && node -e "const fs = require('fs'); const path = require('path'); const src = 'src/__tests__/fixtures'; const dest = 'dist/__tests__/fixtures'; if (fs.existsSync(src)) { fs.mkdirSync(dest, { recursive: true }); fs.readdirSync(src).filter(f => f.endsWith('.json')).forEach(f => fs.copyFileSync(path.join(src, f), path.join(dest, f))); console.log('✅ Copied test fixtures'); }"
scripts.rebuild: npm run clean && npm run build
scripts.lint:imports: echo '✓ Import paths checked by main lint'
scripts.validate:module-type: node -e "const pkg = require('./package.json'); if (pkg.type !== 'module') { console.error('Package must have type: module'); process.exit(1); } else { console.log('✅ Package type is module'); }"
scripts.validate:ts-version: node -e "const ts = require('typescript'); const v = ts.version.split('.'); if (parseInt(v[0]) < 5 || (parseInt(v[0]) === 5 && parseInt(v[1]) < 6)) { console.error('Requires TypeScript 5.6+, found:', ts.version); process.exit(1); } else { console.log('✅ TypeScript version:', ts.version); }"
scripts.check: npm run format:check && npm run type-check && npm run lint
scripts.check:enhanced: npm run format:check && npm run type-check && npm run lint && npm run validate:module-type && npm run validate:ts-version
